program.class: template_class_name which is used for match against regex
program.issafe: true or false - to suppress execution warning message
program.executable: The program to execute, e.g. mstsc.exe
program.path: The path to the program to execute, e.g. C:\windows\system32
program.staticarg: The static argument string and the parameters %%ca** %%oa** as described above
program.Isdll: true or false - If this is true, a .NET DLL can be loaded / run instead of an external command
program.DllNamespaceName: The name of the namespace in the DLL which contains the Class and the DLL entry method
program.DllClassName: The class name which contains the DLL entry method
program.DllMethodName: The method name to call from the ClipboardAccelerator tool
program.DllConfigFilePath: Path to a configuration file for the DLL (optional)
program.ShellExecute: true or false - If this is true, the string in the staticarg parameter is executed using the shells default handler. E.g. a URL is opened by the default browser.
